isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WHEELS, RIMS AND TIRES - TIRE CARE - ALIGNMENT - FRONT AXLE

svcproc.title: ALIGNMENT - FRONT AXLE
svcproc.para: Before any alignment adjustment is performed, always check the vehicle for loose king pins, worn wheel bearings and tire rod ends, or any looseness in the steering system. Attempts to correct alignment on a vehicle with worn components are fruitless. Refer to GROUP 02 - FRONT AXLES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for front axle alignment information.
